title: Recording a Highlight
body:
For some reason, the moment I clicked the 'record' button, it crashes. Not just once, but multiple times already.
Would love to have some help from you guys :)

replies.body: Hmmmm that's a new one. Some of the files needed for replays might have been damaged somehow, so I'd suggest trying to run a repair through the client options really quickly. Let me know if that helps or not though!
Unfortunately after running the full repair a few times, it still crashes. Recording just a few days back was fine up until today.
